text.h
======

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`Graphic <graphic.md>`__

**Description:**

Declares the **Text** class that provides functions to set basic text
attributes, such as the text direction and alignment mode.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0
